website_summaries.verdict: Metal dog whistles with lanyards make this choice useful and a good value that works for most, but not all, dogs.
pros: A pack of two whistles at an affordable price
Owners have praised them for the well-made metal construction
Includes two lanyards that are easy to attach
cons: Some humans can hear the whistle, but this is a minor concern
May not work for all dogs

customer_reviews.title: SILENT WHISTLE
customer_reviews.text: Adjust "Silent" whistle works great but requires training. My dog responded instantly.If the dog will not obey your verbal commands there is no reason to think he will obey whistle commands.Try to play with your dog more.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't really quell barking. There may be some ultrasonic overtones, but the audible signal is much too loud. Hardly what's advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS. Took pratice and discovery. Well received by dog traning class. I like walking my dog on the beach with this dog whistle. When I call out for her to come. The whistle cuts through the windy and she responds immediately.
customer_reviews.author: doath t george

customer_reviews.title: Good whistle
customer_reviews.text: The whistle is well made and seems to work well. It's not really silent though I imagine the dog hears it louder than I do. But it did work for my dog which is hard pf hearing. My dog comes eventually when I blow it.
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Amazing whistle.
customer_reviews.text: First time using a dog whistle and was a little skeptical until the first try. Amazing ! our wandering pup responded immediately from 200 yards away and came running. We don't have to use it always but it works when we need it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic whistle
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Easy to use. After 30Secs adjusting the pitch. It got my dogs attention. and good value for this price.
customer_reviews.author: mccotor

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice whistle. Fur baby dog had been inconsistent in coming when called. My dog responds to the whistle. Helpfull EBOOK instructions included on how to train.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I was so eager to order this product but to my dismay this crap was just that CRAP!! It does not work the dog continues to bark so I guess I will just have to live with the annoying animal! BLAH BLAH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: connievee3333

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: They work. I mean it’s super handy to wear around your neck. But one dog obeys and the other dog gets scared and pees in the floor, sooo
customer_reviews.author: Tina S.

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: Dogs don't even move their ears, not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Hardly work, wasted my time of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not only purchased for a fast 1 day shipping, but after testing it out, the dog didn't even respond and still kept on barking, only to get my wife pissed off telling me to knock it off with the sound whistler. I even tried to see if there is adjusting sound, only to make my wife telling me to stop and the dog still not listening. This look like basic design, but having to use effective is disappointed for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Wong

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Received my two pack of dog whistles in a timely manner, however they are junk. The whistles put out a high pitch sound that hurts my ears and didn't affect the dog in the slightest. The whistles are not silent or adjustable as advertised. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dog equipment.
customer_reviews.text: After a disappointing experience with a cheap dog whistle, I decided to try this dog whistle. After I did it outdoor, my dog responds to it by running to me immediately. It is a excellent piece of equipment for any dog owner. Be patient and follow the instructions. It will surprise you.
customer_reviews.author: nare hema

customer_reviews.title: Love these whistles
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I don't even have to use them, as in blow the whistle, just when my dogs see them now they stop barking.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: This product did NOT work at all for my dog. I have a young German Shepard and I am training him to come when called, house breaking and stopping him from biting. I adjusted this whistle to every frequency possible. I blew lightly and I blew forcefully and every way in between. My dog’s ear never even flinched or perked up. He never acknowledged the whistle in any way. Completely useless. I literally threw both of the whistles in the trash. It may work on other dogs, but it obviously does not work on my German Shepard.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Waggy tail comes running
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to call my dog without having to yell or whistle loudly and they work great for my dog who comes running when she hears it. I may reorder if I think my sister could benefit from one and if I can’t find a better deal. The lanyards and carrying holders are handy and should keep the whistles from hiding and unscrewing like others do. I never saw the “how-to” info so there’s probably more to know about them. I picked these because the price seemed right and the reviews were good enough. I’d be happier if I didn’t have to go online for the info, but if it keeps the price low ok.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I was after a bark deterrent whistle
customer_reviews.text: The neighbor's dog barks when it sees anything move in the neighborhood, and ignores the whistle in its excitement. If the whistle annoys the neighbor more than my yelling at the dog did, it will be a success. I may offer her the whistle so she can use it to train the stupid thing. This is not a silent whistle.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: never worked
customer_reviews.text: sorry but these never works. I tried all the different adjustment I could think off. collected all the help I could find... well it is a whistle that dogs don't ear any more or any less than you will.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre TinelTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: GOOD CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I just received my whistles and lanyards. When I emailed THINKPRICE for my Professional Ultrasonic Dog Whistle Guide, It was provided very timely. i have read through the Dog Whistle Guide, it is straight forward and clear. I am excited to put it into practice when I receive my new puppy in a few weeks. I am impressed with this company. Their responses to my emails were timely and informative. I am sure if I have questions in the future, I will receive excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Frailey

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Received two whistles, with no instructions on how to adjust for ultrasonic use. I bought to quiet my neighbor's dogs SILENTLY. When I receive instructions on how to use the whistle (apparently there is an ebook or emanual, but how does one even access this???) I will update my review. Update: seller asked me to contact them via the Amazon app, so I'm updating this review on the app.
customer_reviews.author: JudyBooty1964

customer_reviews.title: Using for  training
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to assist with training two puppies. This does help with keeping their attention. Only a couple weeks in, but like result so far.
customer_reviews.author: Keith T

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The pitch is not adjustable on either whistle. It is well within the hearing range of all humans and is rather shrill and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: NuclearJim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a cheap product. I thought it was supposed to be silent for humans, but a pitched frequency for dogs....it wasn’t. It sounded like a normal whistle and definitely didn’t have any effect on the annoying barking dog that lives next door.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie blanks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: These are very lightweight and while it says they are adjustable I still cannot get them to work. My dog doesn't hear them at all, the neighbor's dogs do not hear them either, they continue to bark and bark. I wouldn't waste money on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy these. They're a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These whistles don't work at all! I can hear the high pitch, and my neighbor's dog just cocks his head, like, "What are you doing blowing on that thing?" It doesn't do anything to make him stop barking. I'm sure there are whistles that do work. These are not it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Adele Booysen

customer_reviews.title: Kinda work
customer_reviews.text: My pup can clearly hear a sound that I can’t from these, but he easily ignores is. He may just be a jerk lol these do make a audible whistle we can here too. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Appa’s papa

customer_reviews.title: It does not really work
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what distance the whistle should be used, I try not to get too close to any stray dog so with the distance I used it did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Buttercup

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Say if It Works
customer_reviews.text: Tried it and dogs seemed to ignore it. It certainly was loud to my hearing and I quit barking.
customer_reviews.author: FoodFrog

customer_reviews.title: The Whistle Isn’t Silent
customer_reviews.text: I thought that dog whistles were silent to humans. These are pretty loud in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Ostrom

customer_reviews.title: It worked!
customer_reviews.text: This whistle worked for my dog. All I have to do now is pick it up and she stops barking. She really did not like the high pitched sound.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bach

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, stay away!
customer_reviews.text: I should have believed the ratings that I read. These do not work. They don't even make good noise makers.
customer_reviews.author: L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not effective at all
customer_reviews.text: No matter what pitch we tried - didn’t work for either of our dogs
customer_reviews.author: M in Va

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work don’t waste your money. Thing broke whistles never worked on my dogs
customer_reviews.author: Suavemex

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: my dogs don't even look my way when I blow this.
customer_reviews.author: x

customer_reviews.title: AH.... Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but these are an epic fail. They are not silent and work about as well as telling your neighbors' dog to shut up through the fence. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kat B

customer_reviews.title: Not silent
customer_reviews.text: Whistle is not silent at all and there was no effect on the 2 barking dogs next door. Gave them to my granddaughter to play with.
customer_reviews.author: AZGirl

customer_reviews.title: It's just a whistle
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I adjusted it, it's just a whistle. I expected only the dog would hear it.
customer_reviews.author: sheila j

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The whistle feels a little heavy on a lanyard. but is compensated by its excellent quality. My puppy paid attention as soon as blown. Now he has been trained to come and sit. I have attached to my keys chain so its always with me.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Story

customer_reviews.title: watch yourself
customer_reviews.text: to help quiet a neighbor dog blew the whistle and it almost knocked me out hurt MY ears and gave me a headache
customer_reviews.author: philip garcia

customer_reviews.title: Whistles do work
customer_reviews.text: My dog at 16weeks has already comes when I use the whistle.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie A. Lambaren

customer_reviews.title: Useless.
customer_reviews.text: Whistle is loud but my dogs ignore it like they could care less. So, for me they are off no use.
customer_reviews.author: Anie Sckomp

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as intended
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as intended. This whistle is meant to stop dogs from barking. Some people may not like it, but it really works for me. Its better to follow the training manual.
customer_reviews.author: Rough Emma

customer_reviews.title: Unbelevable
customer_reviews.text: I traveled for 3 months, When I came back and blew this whistle. Unbelevable, it's really amazing! My dog still remembers it and responds immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Seffive

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: My dog reacted once when I first got the whistle. He hadn’t reacted since. Not worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: Not a real dog whistle, just makes a little higher pitch noise than a real whistle.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: My dog did not respond to it at ALL. I gave one to my sister and her dogs responded the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: WHISTLE DOESNT WORK AT ALL. NEITHER OF THEM. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: A.

product_meta.title: THINKPRICE 2 Pack Dog Whistle to Stop Barking - Barking Control Adjustable Frequency Ultrasonic Sound Training Tool- Adjustable Pitch-Free Premium Lanyard Strap &EBOOK Training Guide
feature_bullets: Easy To Use And Train Your Dog:Adjustable frequencies,Easily teach your dog unlimited commands such as sit, come, stop barking, stay, and more.
Safe Dog Whistle:Will NOT hurt your dogs ears.Use Silent Bark Control for dogs stopping useless barking.
Anti Loss:New Dual Anti Loss Features with Special Lock Nut & Cover with Lanyard.
Quality Made:Designed reasonable small size & comes in premium metal black color,Long lasting and rust proof.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
